1018890.name: Elven Magic SE Moon
1018890.description:
A story about Elves and Witches. Elven Voices delves deeper into Fae the elven witch's apprentice and there endless struggle to recover their lost spell book from Earthen Lands without drawing any attention to themselves because this is strictly forbidden by the Elven Elders.


This Game is different on Mac and Windows until more versions can be uploaded. There are different variations of this game on each operating system. I think most people have a mac or access to one now anyway.

This Game is on the Moon with graphics that resemble the moon.

Mac - Age of Empires type Towers that can attack enemy's and No Crafting System at this stage

Windows - Crafting Functioning to some extent with room for expansion, This client doesnt have Towers at this stage. Camera Keys (Activate)F1, (Change Camerax4 to Attack)F2
1018890.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
